query:
ALTER TABLE users 
ADD COLUMN memberId VARCHAR(32) UNIQUE AFTER telegramUsername,
ADD COLUMN phoneVerified BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE AFTER phone,
ADD COLUMN birthday DATE AFTER phoneVerified,
ADD COLUMN city VARCHAR(128) AFTER birthday,
ADD COLUMN profileCompleted BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE AFTER loginMethod;
